about_the_game:
Have you checked under the bed? Or in the closet? We guarantee there's no monsters there!

There's No Monsters is a hidden object game with a selection of 9 locations and random monsters to find for each of them.

  • try out 2/9 levels in the demo!
  • 3 Difficulty Settings
  • replayable with 20 monsters out of 60 selected for each play
  • hint system
  • zoom
  • achievements

There's No Monsters is a hidden object game with a selection of 9 locations and random monsters to find for each of them.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10
  • Processor: 2007 or later
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: 2007 or later
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: There's No Monsters Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
